divs: Sighting DetailsDriving down Jericho Turnpike, I noticed a large object hanging just below a cloud. I pulled I to a parking lot to get a better view. Once stopped, the object pitched upwards 10-15 degrees. It slowly moved into or was enveloped by the cloud. I attempted to drive in the direction it was traveling, but it was gone. I had a problem getting my phone camera to load. I captured 3 seconds of the event. I do not have a drawing yet. I find it hard to draw.
Summary: Large object stationary. Object just below cloud angled 15deg pulled into cloud. Disappeared
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in East Northport
There were no other sightings in East Northport on or around July 18th 2012
